Title: America's AI Action Plan
Description:
The White House just released a 28-page AI Action Plan alongside Anthropic's infrastructure report, revealing America's strategy for global AI dominance. This episode breaks down the energy crisis where China is adding 400+ gigawatts while the US manages only "several dozen," creating a massive infrastructure gap that threatens American AI leadership. We cover the White House's three-part strategy to accelerate AI innovation, build American AI infrastructure, and lead global AI diplomacy, plus Anthropic's warning that AI will need 50+ gigawatts by 2028 which equals twice New York City's peak demand.
